attributes.action: Recover the £650,000 per year pension awarded to the failed Royal Bank of Scotland chief Sir Fred Goodwin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite a huge government handout to keep the bank afloat, RBS still decided to pay Sir Fred Goodwin his obscene pension of £650,000 per year for life! This was paid under the banks descretion and not part of contractual obligations.

Why is the man cited as being responsible for a £24 bllion loss being rewarded in such a way?
